MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY17 postcode area of Newtown, affecting properties in Trefeglwys Road, Station Road, Main street and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:58am on 31st October 2020.
